item.title: Missing Restriction Post, 5th August
item.description:
A concreted wood post originally installed to prevent cars driving over pavement outside property which had been dislodged by previous vans hitting it has been removed within last 2 days and buried in a skip which has been collected within the last few days.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Holmdale Road, Chislehurst, London

item.title: No Dropped kerbs for disabled people/ buggies to cross the road from one path to another., 5th August
item.description:
At the Bostall park end of Cumberland Drive there is no way for wheelchairs or buggies to cross using a dropped kerb. There is no dropped kerb between both sides of Cumberland Drive and both sides of Bostall park Avenue. The only way is to bump up and down the kerbs or walk in the road until you reach a dropped kerb.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cumberland Drive, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
